description: Tech billionaire Elijah Armstrong found dead in his penthouse office. Multiple toxins detected, suggesting a sophisticated assassination. Security systems showed evidence of quantum-level tampering. Victim was involved in controversial merger with implications for international quantum computing research. Last known video shows meeting with unknown diplomatic personnel. Project Phoenix files partially deleted.
evidence_collected: Multiple poison traces, quantum encryption device, diplomatic security badge, Project Phoenix fragments, offshore account documents

description: Critical quantum technology stolen from R&D server room. Evidence of both internal and external breach. Quantum-based security protocols bypassed using diplomatic-grade tools. Connection to international technology transfer investigation.
evidence_collected: Security logs, damaged quantum encryption modules, diplomatic-grade hacking tools

description: CEO received quantum-encrypted death threat regarding Project Phoenix and upcoming merger. Message traced to multiple international sources. References to classified quantum research.
Heated confrontation between victim and multiple senior staff regarding quantum technology transfer and security protocols. Unknown diplomatic personnel observed leaving shortly after.
evidence_collected: Surveillance footage, quantum security logs, diplomatic documentation

description: Dr. Sophia Zhang's death linked to international quantum technology dispute. Evidence suggests connection to CryptoSphere case. Multiple intelligence agencies involved.
evidence_collected: Advanced quantum devices, diplomatic documents, encrypted research data

description: Diplomat's death connected to quantum technology transfer investigation. Links to both CryptoSphere and NexusTech cases.
location_details: Geneva International Conference Center, Main Hall
evidence_collected: Diplomatic encryption devices, quantum research documents

description: Hospital murder shows pattern matching CryptoSphere case. Victim involved in quantum medical research.
evidence_collected: Advanced medical equipment, security badges, research notes

description: Art curator death linked to smuggling of quantum technology disguised as artifacts. Connected to international investigation.
evidence_collected: Ancient artifacts, hidden quantum devices, coded diplomatic notes
